title: SX-Attribute如何外部注册新属性
author: 赵坚睿
txt_content:
本帖最后由 赵坚睿 于 2020-4-24 21:44 编辑 

我想在sx里加个攻击加成，生命加成之类的属性，就像图上的一样,怎么弄？




QQ图片20200423222905.png (2.88 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-4-23 22:29 上传






  已解决，使用SX-MoreAttribute即可~

replies.author: 泡泡咸鱼
replies.txt_content:
这不是sx自带的
可以试试用ap 然后把ap属性名字修改

replies.author: a1173398164
replies.txt_content:
这个需要一定插件开发基础 
就是加一个附属插件

replies.author: 赵坚睿
replies.txt_content: sx默认只有生命值，攻击力awa

replies.author: a1173398164
replies.txt_content: 我记得是有人开发过这种插件的 我帮你找找看

replies.author: 恹猫_
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 恹猫_ 于 2020-4-24 00:32 编辑 

sx的话需要附属插件
ap自带加成属性

replies.author: NaiFen☀
replies.txt_content: 图上的未必是SX 可能是Skillapi 或者是plusStats  也有可能只是单纯的修改了词条名而已

replies.author: 天空工作室
replies.txt_content: 这个功能用原版就能实现吧.../give @p minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {1:1,display:{Lore:["生命加成：23%","攻击加成：23%","防御加成：23%"]},HideFlags:63b,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"noName",Amount:23d,Operation:1,UUIDMost:6224542494116664L,UUIDLeast:6224542494116664L,Slot:mainhand},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"noName",Amount:23d,Operation:1,UUIDMost:4569787416117559L,UUIDLeast:4569787416117559L,Slot:mainhand},{AttributeName:"generic.maxHealth",Name:"noName",Amount:23d,Operation:1,UUIDMost:7944957425995152L,UUIDLeast:7944957425995152L,Slot:mainhand}]}试一下这个指令，如果最大生命有问题的话就改成/give @p minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {1:1,display:{Lore:["生命加成：23%","攻击加成：23%","防御加成：23%"]},HideFlags:63b,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"noName",Amount:23d,Operation:1,UUIDMost:6224542494116664L,UUIDLeast:6224542494116664L,Slot:mainhand},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"noName",Amount:23d,Operation:1,UUIDMost:4569787416117559L,UUIDLeast:4569787416117559L,Slot:mainhand},{AttributeName:"generic.maxHealth",Name:"noName",Amount:123d,Operation:1,UUIDMost:7944957425995152L,UUIDLeast:7944957425995152L,Slot:mainhand}]}

replies.txt_content:
